page.title: 03OUR LIFE AT HOME &SCHOOL III
page.content: BREAK DANCING AND ORDINARY DANCING. ALL OUR CLASS ARE CHRISTIANS. 12 CHILDREN GO TO CHURCH OR SUNDAY SCHOOL REGULARLY.ONE PERSON IS A JEHOVA'S WITNESS. AT HOME ONLY ONE CHILD HAS NO T.V. THERE ARE VIDEOS IN 20 HOMES AND 23 HOMES HAVE CARS,7 OF THESE HAVE 2 CARS! FOR PETS 20 OF US HAVE DOGS,12 HAVE FISH,2 HAVE HORSES AND ONE CHILD HAS A RABBIT,TURTLE OR TORTOISE.IN SCHOOL WE DO THE USUAL MATHS AND ENGLISH.WE WATCH ZIG-ZAG ON T.V. FOR ENVIROMENTAL STUDIES AND LISTEN TO NATURE ON THE RADIO.WE JOIN IN SINGING TOGETHER ON THE RADIO.OUR MAIN GAMES ARE BASEBALL IN THE SUMMER AND FOOTBALL AND NETBALL IN THE WINTER.
